message: I'm feeling generous, but let's not waste any more time with unfair offers. Take it or leave it.
I'll compromise, 58% is the lowest I'll go
Time is running out, Alice. This is my final offer, take it and we both win.
I'll meet you halfway between my last offer and your last offer
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. I'm offering a near even split. Don't be greedy, let's end this.
